Package de.db.derpate.persistence

Class EntityManagerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.db.derpate.persistence.EntityManagerFactory
  • public final class EntityManagerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This factory uses java's Persistence class to create an EntityManagerFactory and EntityManager's using the persistence settings file (src/main/resources/META-INF/persistence.xml).
    Pattern: Singleton
    Author:
    MichelBlank
    See Also:
    EntityManagerFactory

      • getInstance

        protected static @NonNull EntityManagerFactory getInstance()
        Returns the EntityManagerFactory
        Returns:
        the EntityManagerFactory

      • getEntityManager

        protected javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()
        Create a new application-managed EntityManager. This method returns a new EntityManager instance each time it is invoked. The isOpen method will return true on the returned instance.
        Returns:
        EntityManager instance
        See Also:
        EntityManagerFactory.createEntityManager()

      • buildProperties

        private static java.util.Properties buildProperties()
        Builds a Properties object containing database settings (such as url, username and password) defined in Constants.Database.
        Returns:
        the Properties
